text:
Please add mime-type mapping for the html5 cache manifest to web.xml

    <mime-mapping>
        <extension>manifest</extension>
        <mime-type>text/cache-manifest</mime-type>
    </mime-mapping>

The cache manifest is describe here
http://www.w3.org/TR/2011/WD-html5-20110525/offline.html
and here
http://developer.apple.com/library/ios/#documentation/AppleApplications/Reference/SafariWebContent/Client-SideStorage/Client-SideStorage.html
creator: stefan.gebhardt@finux.net
markt@apache.org
text: I have sync'd Tomcat with the list in httpd. That pulled in this and a bunch of new / updated types. The updated list has been applied to trunk and 7.0.x
